title: FS: 1888 N332 S.F. Hess Boxers, Alf Greenfield (Sold)
author: SetBuilder

posts.post_title: FS: 1888 N332 S.F. Hess Boxers, Alf Greenfield (Sold)
posts.post_content:
Here is a rare find.  This particular Alf Greenfield in SGC 50 grade sold for $1,400+ at Heritage in 2008, but I'm not sure how accurate that comp is.  This example is a bit of a beater, with a few cracks along the left edge and an area of paper loss near the name.  Clear image with good eye appeal, even with the defects.  

SOLD.
